channel.title: Forum of Lies 30 - Night 5 (5/18) The Demon and Inquisitor win!
channel.description:
![ToLBanner|690x249](upload://rSJfy1vKTD3sQsZUHdaWylVMKbu)
### Welcome to Forum of Lies 30 - hosted by @Napoleon, @katze and @Geyde ### Alt Mod is @Arete
## Rules
Follow the [Global Forum/Discord/Game/Meta Rules - Please Read First ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244), and the [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926). Please make sure you have enough time for this game before you sign up.
**A minimum of 20 game-relevant posts must be posted every day, including Day 1. Failure to meet the requirement will result in a warning, where a second offense will lead to forced replacement. However, hosts reserve the right to replace without a warning should we believe that a potential extended period of lowposting will result in a significant drop of game quality.**
## Gameplay
* Days are 48 hours long or until an execution ends it, Nights last 24 hours. The first day is an exception, it lasts only 24 hours and has no execution. * You will be provided a DM with your classcard by the host, send your actions there. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message. * All classes will be used as they are found in this thread: [FoL Class Cards (Now Officially Official) ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998)
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/vote [player]”. Please make the life of the hosts easier by bolding it (by putting ** ** around it) * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end. * When the day ends, the player with the most votes will be executed. * Voting “/no cuddling” is an option. * You may self vote now.
## Picking a New King
* If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
You find all possible night feedback here: [Forum of Lies Hosting Feedback List](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082)
Action order for Nerds
Night abilities will be processed in following order/priority:
1. Visit Prevention 2. Occupation 3. Targetted redirection 4. Non targetted redirection (like Tavernkeeper) 5. Killing 6. Protection 7. Miscellaneous Effects (like Bounty) 8. Investigation 1 (Faction checks, type checks, etc) 9. Conversion 10. Investigation 2 (Every kind of investigation which checks for abilities used *this* night)
In case there are conflicts on the same level (example: two Drunks try to redirect the same player), all these conflicting effects are canceled.
(thx Geyde)
## Journals
DM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone. It has a character limit of 1000 characters.
## Classlist
[color=gold]**King**[/color] **(65% [color=steblue]Good[/color], 35% [color=purple]Evil[/color] / [color=darkred]Devout[/color])** [color=purple]**Mastermind**[/color] / [color=darkred]**Cult Leader**[/color] [color=purple]**Assassin**[/color] / [color=darkred]**Random Cult**[/color] [color=steblue]**Prince**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] / [color=grey]**Random Neutral Non-Killer**[/color] [color=grey]**Random Neutral Non-Killer**[/color] [color=grey]**Neutral Killer**[/color]
### You can find all classes here: [FoL Class Cards (Now Officially Official) ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998)
## Playerlist
1. SoulShade55r 2. ~~Wazza~~ Vulgard 3. RuneScimitar 4. CRichard564 5. ~~Paradox~~ **Died N3 - [color=purple]The Assassin[/color]** 6. PokemonRyanKid :crown: 7. ~~ATNoName~~ - **Executed D3 - [color=purple]The Mastermind[/color]** 8. ~~Insanity~~ **Died N3 - [color=steblue]The Drunk[/color]** 9. ~~Surge~~ **Executed D5 - [color=purple]The Assassin[/color]** 10. ~~Whysper~~ - **Died N2 - [color=steblue]The Observer[/color]** 11. ~~eevee~~ - **Died N3 - [color=lavender]The Inquisitor[/color]** 12. ~~an_gorta_pratai~~ - **Died N3 - [color=steblue]The Prince[/color]** 13. ~~Magnus~~ - **Executed D2 - [color=steblue]The Maid[/color]** 14. ~~SirDerpsALot~~ - **Died N3 - [color=steblue]The Tavernkeeper[/color]** 15. ~~Chaos_Coffee~~ - **Died N1 - [color=steblue]The Princess[/color]** 16. ~~Light~~ - **Executed D4 - [color=purple]The Mastermind[/color]** 17. ~~Frostwolf103~~ ~~Mistyx~~ - **Died N2 - [color=steblue]The Tavernkeeper[/color]** 18. ~~Intensify~~ - **Died N1 - [color=steblue]The Archer[/color]**
## Backups
1. TheBlueElixir 2. Amelia
## Spectators (both uninformed and informed are allowed)
1. astand (Informed) 2. DatBird (Informed) 3. Marshal (Informed) 4. Italy (Informed) 5. Arete (Informed) 6. Jane (Informed)
# Alts are allowed in this setup. Please PM Arete if you wish to play by alt.
## Threadmarks
[**EoD1:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/forum-of-lies-30-day-2-16-18/83564/1289?u=katze) **No execution, what did you expect?** [**SoD2:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/forum-of-lies-30-day-2-16-18/83564/1299?u=katze) [color=steblue]**Chaos_Coffee**[/color] and [color=steblue]**Intensify**[/color] dead [**EoD2:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/forum-of-lies-30-night-2-15-18/83564/3302?u=katze) [color=steblue]**Magnus**[/color] dead [**SoD3:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/forum-of-lies-30-day-3-13-18/83564/3305?u=katze) [color=steblue]**Whysper**[/color] and [color=steblue]**Mistyx**[/color] dead [**EoD3:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/forum-of-lies-30-night-3-12-18/83564/4704) [color=purple]**ATNoName**[/color] dead [**SoD4:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/forum-of-lies-30-day-4-7-18/83564/4709?u=katze) [color=purple]**Paradox**[/color], [color=steblue]**Insanity**[/color], [color=lavender]**eevee**[/color], [color=steblue]**an_gorta_pratai**[/color], [color=steblue]**SirDerpsAlot**[/color] massacred [**EoD4:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/forum-of-lies-30-night-4-6-18/83564/5079?u=katze) **[color=purple]Light[/color]** dead [**SoD5:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/forum-of-lies-30-night-4-6-18/83564/5101?u=katze) [color=yellow]**The Sun**[/color] is alive (Nobody died) [**EoD5:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/forum-of-lies-30-day-5-5-16-the-demon-and-inquisitor-win/83564/5255?u=katze) [color=purple]**Surge**[/color] dead, Game ends [**Spreadsheet**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-30-day-5-5-16-the-demon-and-inquisitor-win/83564/5290?u=katze)

item.title: Forum of Lies 30 - Night 5 (5/18) The Demon and Inquisitor win!
item.dc:creator: Jane
item.description:
FoL Class Cards (Now Officially Official)

Sadism (Passive) - If you are alive in the final four players and the Unseen or Cult have not already mechanically won, everyone else present that has not already won instantly dies.

If they lived to F4, they would automatically win.

FoL Class Cards (Now Officially Official)

If Haemophilia is used, the target is immune to visits from others except you, and anyone who attempts to visit them is also killed by the flames. In addition, Funeral Pyre will bypass death immunity on the initial target and not count as a visit.

And since they used Haemophilia, there was nothing that could prevent them from reaching F4.

Read full topic
